insert into data_stream_ext (id, business_identifier, data_stream_identifier, key_name, key_value, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.businessIdentifier}, #{item.dataStreamIdentifier}, #{item.keyName}, #{item.keyValue}, #{item.isDeleted})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), business_identifier = values(business_identifier), data_stream_identifier = values(data_stream_identifier), key_name = values(key_name), key_value = values(key_value), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)

key_value = #{keyValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
